name: 21/22 Y1D - Super Circus Fruits Show
description:
All the circus performers have been turned into fruits by the evil ringmaster and are forced through gauntlets to entertain the crowd.

  Tilt the level and make the performers struggle. Experience wacky physics, tumbling through obstacle courses with variable hazards in order to please the crowd!

Controls

Keyboard

WASD: Tilt Level

Mouse: Camera

Space: Jump

H: Pause Menu

Controller

Left Stick: Tilt Level

Right Stick: Camera

A: Jump

Developers DesignersProgrammersVisual ArtistsEmanuele ArdolinoTsanko HristovKai DerzbachMaksim BlagoevWouter HunterLisette van den DolderSophie DapperensJitse ten HoveMaze PresslerOzan SomakLuc van DijkMartien RurengaSebastiano ZezzaEmil Voychev
